articles.description: The stocks picked by Anil Singhvi have strong fundamentals as well as attractive valuations. He suggested investors to include these stocks in their portfolios for the long term and to realise the importance of financial independence.
articles.content: India@100: As India celebrates its 75th year of Independence, Zee Business Managing Editor Anil Singhvi brings a list of 25 stocks that one should have in his/her portfolio for bumper returns in the … [+1277 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Oil stays near multi-month lows on demand worries - DAWN.com
articles.description: "Last week's price action left no doubt that recession-driven demand concerns have upper hand over supply fears," says analyst.
articles.content: Oil prices inched up from multi-month lows on Monday as lingering worries about demand weakening on the back of a darkened economic outlook outweighed some positive economic data from China and the U… [+1688 chars]
